name: Cookoo Cards
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for the Trijam #128. 
Theme: Throw it to me

Cookoo Cards

In this game, you must pass out cards too the eight attendees. Beware, passing a card with the incorrect key leads to a penalty of two cards. Pass out cards as fast as you can to get a new record!

Controls

To play, you must press the key labelled on the glowing attendee. Watch out! incorrectly pressing a key leads to a penalty.
